description: This file defines a singleton object 'PermissionHelper' that provides utility functions for managing Android runtime permissions related to Bluetooth scanning/connection and notifications. It includes methods to determine necessary permissions based on Android version, check if permissions are granted, and optionally provide notification permission for Android 13+.

classes.name: PermissionHelper
classes.description: A singleton object providing permission-related utility functions for Bluetooth and notifications.

methods.name: requiredBluetoothPermissions
methods.description: Returns an array of Bluetooth-related permissions required based on Android version.

methods.name: hasBluetoothPermissions
methods.description: Checks if all required Bluetooth permissions are granted.

methods.name: optionalNotificationPermission
methods.description: Returns the notification permission string for Android 13+ if applicable.
